text: vekatta`nahumu-snetey `asrate esbatan umema. veevhayna ila musa izi-steskahu kavmuh eni-drib bi`asake-lhacer. fembeceset minhu-sneta `asrate `ayna. kad `alime kullu unasim mesrabehum. vezallelna `aleyhimu-lgamame veenzelna `aleyhimu-lmenne vesselva. kulu min tayyibati ma razaknakum. vema zalemuna velakin kanu enfusehum yazlimun
